attributes.action: Her Majesty’s Revenue and Customs must explained why it misused public funds for the British National Party
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, call on the government to explain why Her Majesty’s Revenue and Customs misused public funds to charge an Asian employee with holding ‘extreme political views’ for heckling the British National Party (BNP) at a lawful protest.

 The BNP are a vile Neo Nazi groups who have:

* Sought to remove all non-whites and Jews from UK shores.
* Engaged in violence against those whose presence they object to.
* Have boasted they have strong support within HMRC and the Civil Service in general

We urge the government to conduct a full investigation into this matter and to ascertain who in HMRC ordered public funds to be misused to charge an Asian employee with holding ‘extreme political views’ for heckling such a vile race hate group.
